00025 #include <lunchbox/log.h> // used inline

00027 namespace co

00030     CO_API bool _init( const int argc, char** argv );
00031 
00040     inline bool init( const int argc, char** argv )
00041     {
00042         if( CO_VERSION_ABI == Version::getABI( ))
00043             return co::_init( argc, argv );
00044         LBWARN << "Collage shared library v" << Version::getABI()
00045                << " not binary compatible with application v" << CO_VERSION_ABI
00046                << std::endl;
00047         return false;
00048     }
00049 
00057     CO_API bool exit();
00058 }
